Script.name: send_invoice
send_enrolment

MessageTemplate.name: Enrolment confirmation
MessageTemplate.subject: <college.shortName> [Enrolment confirmation #<invoice.number>]
MessageTemplate.message:
<currentDate> Thank you for enrolling at <college.name>. Your Reference Number is <invoice.number>.
Class List: ------------ <classList>
Please re-visit <college.webAddress> prior to your course to check course materials, instructions and for possible changes. If there are insufficient numbers courses have to be cancelled. We usually cancel courses when necessary, four working days prior to their scheduled start date. It would be wise to check the status your course on the website a day or two prior to its scheduled start date. Please confirm your course is running prior to purchasing any materials and equipment.
The EMERGENCY contact number referred to in the College Brochure is xx xxxx xxxx. This number is for EMERGENCY contact outside College Office hours. Office hours are 9am-5pm Monday to Friday. This number is for use if you are lost, sick or unable to attend a particular session of your course. Our tutors appreciate "apologies" if you are unable to attend.
Please take this confirmation with you to your course as proof of enrolment.
Please remember that "Smoking is Prohibited" by Law on School sites.
We trust that you will enjoy your course(s). Please do not hesitate to contact the College office should you need any further information.
---------------------------- Email: <college.email> Phone: <college.phone> Fax: <college.fax> ----------------------------

MessageTemplate.name: Payment succeeded
MessageTemplate.subject: <college.shortName> [Receipt# <payment.number>]
MessageTemplate.message:
<college.name> Tax Invoice ABN: <college.abn> <college.streetAddress1> <college.suburb> <college.state> <college.postcode> <college.webAddress> <currentDate>
Dear <payer.firstName> <payer.lastName>, thank you for your payment. Your receipt number is <payment.number>.
Total Paid <payment.totalIncTax>
Please feel free to contact the college office should you need any further information. Office hours are 9:00am to 5:00pm, Monday to Friday.
---------------------------- <college.email> <college.phone> phone <college.fax> fax ----------------------------

MessageTemplate.name: Payment failed
MessageTemplate.subject: <college.name>: Enrolment Failed
MessageTemplate.message:
<college.name> ABN: <college.abn> <college.streetAddress1> <college.suburb> <college.state> <college.postcode> <college.webAddress> <currentDate>
Dear <payer.firstName> <payer.lastName>, Your transaction at <college.shortName> failed for the following reason:
<payment.failureMessage>
If you were enrolling in a course, then your enrolment has been unsuccessful. You might like to try again with a different credit card or enrol in a class with more places available.
Please feel free to contact the college office should you need any further information. Office hours are 9:00am to 5:00pm, Monday to Friday.
---------------------------- <college.email> <college.phone> phone <college.fax> fax ----------------------------

MessageTemplate.name: Tax invoice
MessageTemplate.subject: <college.shortName> [Tax Invoice# <invoice.number>]
MessageTemplate.message:
<college.name> Tax Invoice ABN: <college.abn> <college.streetAddress1> <college.suburb> <college.state> <college.postcode> <college.webAddress> <currentDate>
Dear <payer.firstName> <payer.lastName>, thank you for enrolling at <college.shortName>. Your invoice number is <invoice.number>.
------------------------------------------- <invoice.lines> ------------------------------------------- Total tax <invoice.totalTax> Total amount <invoice.totalIncTax>
Payment <invoice.totalPaid> Total owing <invoice.totalOwing>
Please feel free to contact the college office should you need any further information. Office hours are 9:00am to 5:00pm, Monday to Friday.
---------------------------- <college.email> <college.phone> phone <college.fax> fax ----------------------------

MessageTemplate.name: SMS tutor reminder
MessageTemplate.subject: [subject not used for SMS]
MessageTemplate.message: <college.name> reminds you that your class <class.name> begins on <class.startDate>.
